item.name: Backup Server Label Jobs
item.description: Check if any job needs a disk and use the label command if necessary

trigger.name: Bacula Server Label Action Needed
trigger.description: Need to Label or Prune a Volume to be used for the Job

trigger.expression: last(/Template Bacula/bacula.running.jobs)>=1 and time()>={$BACULA.RUNNING.JOBS.NWD.START} and time()<={$BACULA.RUNNING.JOBS.NWD.END} and dayofweek()<6
trigger.name: Bacula Server Still Running Jobs, Check Bacula for possible issue
trigger.description: Bacula jobs are running unexpectedly during a weekday between {$BACULA.RUNNING.JOBS.NWD.START} and {$BACULA.RUNNING.JOBS.NWD.END}

trigger.name: Bacula Server Waiting Jobs Exceeds Permitted Maximum

macro.description: End time of weekday window when no jobs permitted
Start time of weekday window when no jobs permitted
Maximum permitted number of waiting jobs
